An audience member confronted Donald Rumsfeld with his 2003 claim about WMD, We know where they are. Donald Rumsfeld falsely claimed he never said it. The audience member then read Donald Rumsfeld 's quote back to him, leaving the defense secretary speechless. "As the CEO of a biotechnology company, Senator Kirsten Gillibrand 's initiative is extremely important to us," said Dr. Joan Fallon, Curemark founder and CEO. By supporting cutting edge research in the biotechnology field, and thus allowing for innovation, these R&D tax credits will help to defray the costs of basic research and clinical programs, which can be prohibitive to the small biotech companies. We at Curemark are extremely grateful for the Senator's leadership on this issue.
